pullRequest.body:
prove `IsFundamentalSequence.lt`, a fundamental sequence's image is smaller than the ordinal it's a fundamental sequence of.

---

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:

- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

:v: YnirPaz can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11704628664/job/32597481795)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11704628664/job/32597482493)

I think this lemma is fine given the current API. That said, it'd be nice to at some point redefine fundamental sequences as functions `Iio o â†’ Ordinal` (and probably, move all of this to its own file `Ordinal/FundamentalSequence` too).
I was thinking the same thing, once `iSup` is used everywhere.

I think that this lemma should be `protected`, otherwise I trust @vihdzp on this matter.
bors d+
```suggestion
protected theorem lt {a o : Ordinal} {s : Î  p < o, Ordinal}
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(SetTheory/Cardinal/Cofinality): Ordinal.IsFundamentalSequence.lt
